author: mcpierce
msg: QPID-4215 : Adds a target to release.sh to generate Perl language sources.
The --perl | -r cmdline argument generates this file, which includes the
Perl examples as well as the files necessary to generate the language

author: mcpierce
msg: QPID-4214 : Adds a LICENSE and Makefile.PL to the Qpid Perl bindings.

author: mcpierce
msg: QPID-4214 : Updated all Perl examples to work with the new Perl APIs.

author: mcpierce
msg: QPID-4124 : New Perl language bindings for Qpid.
This newer language binding sits on top of those generated by Swig and
provide a set of classes that live in the qpid namespace.

author: mcpierce
msg: QPID-4207 : Relocated all swig .i files to the include directory.
Updated the build systems to use the new locations. Updated all other .i
files to not use relative paths when referencing them.
